title: Crispy fried pigeon
description: Cooked in a rich stock the pigeon meat is infused with soy, anise, cinnamon and citrus flavours, then allowed to dry before being deep-fried for a crispy finish.
ingredients: 2 x 225-350g/8-12oz squab pigeons, cut in half lengthways
150ml/5fl oz Shaoxing rice wine or dry sherry
6 pieces fresh orange peel, finely chopped or dried citrus peel, soaked and finely chopped
3 pieces Chinese cinnamon bark or cinnamon sticks
2 tbsp roasted Sichuan peppercorns, finely ground and sieved
750g/1lb 10oz Chinese greens, such as Chinese flowering cabbage or bok choi
